mapper.sql: code, login_code, user_name, password, email, mobile, phone, sex, avatar, sign, user_type, mgr_type, pwd_update_date, pwd_update_record, pwd_question, pwd_question_answer, pwd_question_2, pwd_question_answer_2, pwd_question_3, pwd_question_answer_3, pwd_quest_update_date, last_login_ip, last_login_date, freeze_date, freeze_cause, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date

a.code as user_code, a.login_code, a.user_name, a.password, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.sex, a.avatar, a.sign, a.user_type, a.mgr_type, a.pwd_update_date, a.pwd_update_record, a.pwd_question, a.pwd_question_answer, a.pwd_question_2, a.pwd_question_answer_2, a.pwd_question_3, a.pwd_question_answer_3, a.pwd_quest_update_date, a.last_login_ip, a.last_login_date, a.freeze_date, a.freeze_cause, a.status, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT `user`.user_name, `user`.user_type, c_u_c.class_code, c.class_code AS class_class_code, c.grade, major.`code` AS major_code, major.`name` AS major_name, department.`code` AS department_code, department.`name` AS department_name, faculty.`code` AS faculty_code, faculty.`name` AS faculty_name FROM all_users AS `user` LEFT JOIN connect_user_student_and_class AS c_u_c ON c_u_c.student_code = `user`.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_model_class AS c ON c_u_c.class_code = c.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree AS major ON c.sys_college_node_code = major.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree AS department ON major.parent_node = department.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree AS faculty ON department.parent_node = faculty.`code` WHERE `user`.login_code = #{loginCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(*) from ( select a.`code` from all_users a,connect_user_student_and_class c ,sys_model_class class,sys_data_tree m ,sys_data_tree d ,sys_data_tree f where c.student_no = a.login_code AND class.`code` = c.class_code AND m.`code` = class.sys_college_node_code AND d.`code` = m.parent_node AND f.`code` = d.parent_node and
f.code = #{faculty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
d.code = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
login_code = #{loginCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR} and
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
mgr_type = #{mgrType,jdbcType=CHAR} and
pwd_update_date = #{pwdUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
pwd_update_record = #{pwdUpdateRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question = #{pwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer = #{pwdQuestionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_2 = #{pwdQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer_2 =#{pwdQuestionAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_3 = #{pwdQuestion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer_3 = #{pwdQuestionAnswer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_quest_update_date = #{pwdQuestUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
freeze_date = #{freezeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
freeze_cause = #{freezeCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
0=0)asda;

select
, f.`name` as faculty,d.`name` as department,m.`name` as major, class.class_code from all_users a LEFT JOIN connect_user_student_and_class c ON c.student_code = a.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_model_class class ON class.`code` = c.class_code LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree m ON m.`code` = class.sys_college_node_code LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree d ON d.`code` = m.parent_node LEFT JOIN sys_data_tree f ON f.`code` = d.parent_node where
f.code = #{faculty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
d.code = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
login_code = #{loginCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR} and
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
mgr_type = #{mgrType,jdbcType=CHAR} and
pwd_update_date = #{pwdUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
pwd_update_record = #{pwdUpdateRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question = #{pwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer = #{pwdQuestionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_2 = #{pwdQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer_2 =#{pwdQuestionAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_3 = #{pwdQuestion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_question_answer_3 = #{pwdQuestionAnswer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pwd_quest_update_date = #{pwdQuestUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
freeze_date = #{freezeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
freeze_cause = #{freezeCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
0=0 order by login_code DESC
LIMIT #{page_start} ,#{pageSize}

select
distinct
from all_users
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into all_users (code, login_code, user_name, password, email, mobile, phone, sex, avatar, sign, user_type, mgr_type, pwd_update_date, pwd_update_record, pwd_question, pwd_question_answer, pwd_question_2, pwd_question_answer_2, pwd_question_3, pwd_question_answer_3, pwd_quest_update_date, last_login_ip, last_login_date, freeze_date, freeze_cause, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgrType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pwdUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pwdUpdateRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestionAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestionAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestionAnswer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdQuestUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{freezeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{freezeCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
